name: Apple MacBook Air
description: The MacBook Air is a lightweight laptop designed for portability and performance, with a sleek design, Retina display, and long battery life.

name: Bose QuietComfort 35 II
description: The Bose QuietComfort 35 II are wireless noise-cancelling headphones with exceptional sound quality, a comfortable design, and Alexa voice control.

name: Canon EOS R5
description: The Canon EOS R5 is a professional-grade mirrorless camera with a 45-megapixel full-frame sensor, 8K video capability, and advanced autofocus system.

name: iRobot Roomba i7+
description: The iRobot Roomba i7+ is a powerful robot vacuum with automatic dirt disposal, advanced mapping, and Alexa and Google Assistant compatibility.

name: Instant Pot Duo Nova
description: The Instant Pot Duo Nova is a versatile 7-in-1 pressure cooker, slow cooker, rice cooker, steamer, saut√© pan, yogurt maker, and warmer, with easy one-touch controls.

name: Shark Navigator Lift-Away
description: The Shark Navigator Lift-Away is a lightweight upright vacuum with powerful suction and a detachable canister for portable cleaning of stairs and furniture.

name: Nespresso Vertuo Coffee Maker
description: The Nespresso Vertuo Coffee Maker uses Centrifusion technology to brew rich, flavorful coffee and espresso with the touch of a button, and includes a milk frother for lattes and cappuccinos.

name: Cuisinart Classic Waffle Maker
description: The Cuisinart Classic Waffle Maker makes crispy, golden waffles with deep pockets, adjustable browning control, and nonstick plates for easy cleaning.
